name: Segmentation Camera Sensor
description:
This sensor returns an image where objects are colored corresponding to their tag. Example of Instance Segmentation Tags. Be aware that this effects performance greatly.
	"InstanceSegmentationTags": [
		"Car",
		"Pedestrian",
		"Obstacle",
		"Building"
	]
See {{DOCS_HOST}}/docs/python-api/#segmentation-camera for more details.
